cards.name: 海白鎧猫
cards.description: Using its Glacial Surge and Jab abilities, 海白鎧猫 is an awe-inspiring sight to behold as it patrols the seas and coasts. Its white armor reflects the shimmering sunlight off of its steel-hard exterior. It enthusiastically wriggles through the waves during the day, munching on sea grass as it goes, and hunting for its favorite fishy treats at night. It's a mysterious, majestic guardian of the ocean.
cards.image_prompt: 海白鎧猫::0 a special water-type 猫 pokemon::1.8, wearing white armor, in a ocean environment, aurora background, anime sketch --niji --ar 3:2
